title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards: A YGO RPG!

media:group.media:title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards: A YGO RPG!
media:group.media:description:
Equip this game to get a +1 to Heart of the Cards.

Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/powerpak
Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/JackWNicholls

Chapters:

00:00 - Intro
01:37 - Game Premise
02:26 - Yu-Gi-Oh as an RPG
04:22 - How to play Yugioh (Abridged)
05:19 - The Sacred Cards Rules
10:05 - Duel Duration
11:32 - HOW IS IT NOW?
11:46 - AI Anarchy
12:45 - Story, Writing, Translation
15:00 - YGO Code System
15:42 - SPOILERS No More 4Kids
16:15 - SPOILERS You, not Yugi
19:41 - Conclusions
21:19 - D
